title: Elementalist Lux
body:
First I apologize if this has already been posted somewhere, but this is the second game I've had against EL, and it has become more of a problem the more I play against her.  I'm not sure what element it is or what its called, so if anyone can help that would be wonderful.  My problem is with EL's E (Lucent Singularity) in a couple of her forms.  What I know is that with the Snowdown SR map (Thank you for bringing that back by the way) when she has one of white or soft colored elements on I can no longer see the E on the ground. I like to think I can move/flash out of them in time if I have to, more so if I am low oh HP. But if you can't see it until the slowed trails appear there is no real counter play. 

Now not to go straight up salty and qq everything, I want to point out that I might not be unique in this regard however I am color blind to certain colors, is there anyway we can adjust the resolution to make it more visible or even have Riot adjust it so that it shows up better? I'm not sure what else to do besides put Lux on a perma ban so I don't have to deal with not being able to see the skins abilities.

Any advice or help is appreciated.

Sincerly Ozias of Scagnar

replies.body: Wind is kinda hard to see.  I see your point with ice but the range indicator and changes in the area make it fairly easy to notice.

Please stop using a shitty TN monitor. IPS mastard rice.
No, really. It probably is a graphics issue, but it is still a valid concern for people with colorblindness or just really shitty monitors. Since it is only a seasonal map, i doubt riot would fix it - but a red ring around it, similar to some other AoEs, would be a good change.
